title: Staff Engineer, Software Development, Applied Data Science Center Development
description:
Role Summary:


As one of our most senior engineers, you will lead the design and development of data science applications, aimed at supporting clinical trials business, including optimizing design and execution of clinical trials, and improving risk management.


You will be a hands-on technical leader, providing architecture and shaping coding standards. You also will evangelize best practices for software engineering including design, development, and lifecycle maintenance, and will partner with multiple software engineering teams to encourage practices like code reusability / shared libraries, UX driven design, and a culture of continuous improvement.


As a Staff Engineer you will mentor senior engineers, sharing best practices and learning together across all disciplines of our work.


You will meet frequently with stakeholders, product managers, engineering managers, data scientists, and other individual contributor engineers to understand a wide array of technical and business impacting variables, and distil these into strategic and tactical choices that our engineering teams will use to develop and improve software products for our customers.


Responsibilities:

* Design and lead implementation of projects, including establishing and enforcing standards
* Make decisions affecting analysis and implementation of all details of architecture for projects
* Determines direction needed to achieve prescribed long-term objectives
* Independently contribute to stable, reliable product development work after being given an objective
* Consistently delivers robust, high-quality, reliable engineering outcomes
* Suggest areas of work for themselves and their team
* Mentor interns, apprentices, and other engineers
* Emulate curiosity and innovation
* Research current and emerging industry tools and techniques, and share these findings with colleagues
* Provide solutions that are innovative and original
* Lead cross-team exercises, including incident management bridges (DevOps, MLEOps, etc)
* Take proactive steps to improve product quality
* Perform code reviews for work submitted by other engineers
* Proactively identify and propose solutions for business-impacting technical challenges
* Encourage cross-domain collaboration among engineers and engineering managers in multiple disciplines (software engineering, test engineering, and site reliability engineering)


Qualifications:

* Led projects with teams of peers (peer leadership/influence, not HR management authority)
* Solid understanding of clinical research business domain
* Used/consumed APIs made by others
* Used CI/CD commit, test, deploy tools
* Implemented and supervised version control strategies
* Developed object-oriented software using Python 3.x
* Developed object-oriented software using JavaScript (ES5/6 or ES2015+)
* Designed and developed Microservices and APIs
* Developed software for container environments
* Deployed software into AWS or Azure
* Deployment automation using Terraform
* Deployed software into Kubernetes containers
* Strong verbal and written communication abilities
* Clear understanding of business operations
* Ability to blend business and technical inputs
* Prior experience working in a collaborative Agile environment
* Previous experience with production level cloud ecosystems (AWS preferred)
* Previous experience working with large volumes of complex data including modern ETL processes and tools e.g. Airflow
* Career must include more than 8 years of total experience
* Career must include employment lasting at least 2 years per company with at least 4 companies
* Career must demonstrate progressively increasing scope of responsibility and technical ability


IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com
company_description: IQVIA (NYSE:IQV) is a leading global provider of advanced analytics, technology solutions and clinical research services to the life sciences industry dedicated to delivering actionable insights.

title: Function Designer
description:
**Everything we do starts with people.**


Our human-centric focus is what makes us different from all other car companies, and it’s at the heart of everything we create. If you want to join us in our mission to make people’s lives less complicated, we offer you a chance to grow together with talented people who want to make a true difference.

  


**What’s in it for you?**
=========================


Safe Vehicle Automation (SVA), consist of around 600 skilled engineers who are responsible for everything from research and advanced engineering, to implementation, verification and validation of current and future customer offers in the area of Safety, Vehicle control and Autonomous Drive. Nested within SVA is the department of AD/ADAS Functions, we develop functions such as Collision Avoidance, Low Speed Assistance, Pilot Assist, connected safety and pave the way towards Autonomous Driving (AD) . We develop and integrate functionality and SW into a complete product, making use of sensor input such as radar, camera, ultrasonic and lidar, that build a comprehensive perception of the car’s surroundings.


One of our Low Speed Assistance teams is now looking for a Function and System design Engineer to support us creating the best costumer experience!


We are offering you the opportunity to be a part of a team where we learn every day, challenge each other, and give continuous feedback. Your long-term competence plan will include steps to expand your knowledge and contributions within many competence areas that are within your interest or needed in the team.

  

**What you’ll do**
==================


**You will be part of the AD ADAS functions department designing Low Speed Assistance functions, where you will take the role as function and system designer within the team. This means that you will create customer function requirements and system requirements for ensuring the realizability of these functions in turn creating the best Low Speed Assistance customer functions on the market. You will develop system interfaces, cooperation with stakeholders, breakdown legal, rating and pertinent attribute requirements for the Low Speed Assistance functions.**


Part of the job description is also to ensure the alignment of these requirements with our stake holders catering to the function implementation plan towards each Volvo Car project.

  

**Do you fit the profile?**
===========================


To be successful in the role you have a drive to learn continuously and are flexible to broaden your experience. You have a bachelors or Masters in Electrical Engineering, Automation and Control, Automotive or similar. You have strong experience in system design, UX concepts, function description document as well as strong experience in ISO262262 – FuSa concepts. Swedish Driving license B is a must! Experience in customer function and system verification as well as experience in parking functionality is considered meritorious.  




**Who are you?**
================


We are looking for a self-driven collaborator with high speed and who takes initiative! A person who is curious, innovative, and entrepreneurial. You care about the people around you, and get things done.


You like technology and cars, but you like the way people and technology interact even more. You want technology to be easy and people oriented, and you want to make it happen. You love collaboration and are a team player with a development mindset.

  


**How to learn more and apply**


For questions about the position please contact the Hiring Manager Shreyas Horantur at shreyas.horantur@volvocars.com or allocated recruiter Dorota at dorota.sambor@volvocars.com. We want your application at 31st October 2024 the latest. Please note that applications via email will not be accepted.

  


**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Content Manager
description:
Har du en passion för kundcentrerat och konverterande innehåll? Bli en del av Skandias resa och utveckla vår kundkommunikation!



Vi söker nu en erfaren Content Manager med fokus på CRM-kanaler, som vill vara med och skapa meningsfullt innehåll som förbättrar kundupplevelsen och påverkar kundernas resa hos oss. Din insats kommer att vara avgörande för att hjälpa våra kunder att ta nästa steg – vare sig det handlar om att välja rätt kring tjänstepension, ta sig igenom ett digitalt flöde eller hitta svar på frågor.


**Om rollen som Content Manager**


I denna roll får du en central position i vårt arbete med att skapa engagerande och effektivt innehåll. Du kommer att arbeta huvudsakligen med CRM-kommunikation, vilket innebär att du tar fram innehåll både för outbound-kanaler (som eDR och sms) samt inbound-kommunikation för inloggade kunder. Ditt mål är att skapa innehåll som når ut, väcker intresse, driver engagemang och leder till handling. Vi kallar därför rollen för Conversion Content Manager.


Våra kunder har tjänstepension, bolån, betaltjänster eller någon av våra förebyggande hälsoprodukter. Vårt och ditt uppdrag är att få dem att också bli kunder hos oss inom privat sparande och pension samt att utveckla relationen med våra redan befintliga spar- och pensionskunder.  

  



Du blir en del av teamet CXM Spara (CXM står för Customer Experience Management), som tillhör avdelningen Försäljning Online. Du kommer arbeta nära kollegor som CRM-projektledare, MA-specialister, konverteringsexperter, UX-designers och utvecklare för att säkerställa att kommunikationen är träffsäker, konverterande och kundfokuserad.


**För att lyckas i rollen**



För att trivas och prestera i rollen ser vi att du har erfarenhet av att skapa digitalt innehåll med ett tydligt fokus på CRM-kommunikation. Du förstår kundens behov och är van vid att arbeta datadrivet och lösningsorienterat, gärna i nära samarbete med olika roller.



Du är en självgående och initiativrik person som motiveras av att skapa kundvärde och är bra på att skapa innehåll som uppfyller såväl affärsmål som regler och krav i branschen. Viktiga egenskaper är att ha ett affärsdriv och att vara beslutsam. Du behöver också kunna vara tydlig och pedagogisk, övertygande och ha förmåga att utveckla goda relationer med interna samarbetspartners. Vi ser att du har:


* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom medieteknik, digital marknadsföring, ekonomi eller kommunikation.
* Kunskaper och/eller intresse kring sparande, placeringar och pension.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av liknande arbete som Content Manager, Copywriter el dyl.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av att skapa innehåll för CRM-kanaler och förmåga att skriva med olika tonaliteter som engagerar kunderna.
* Vana att arbeta med A/B-testning, Marketing Automation-system (gärna MS Dynamics Marketing) och CMS-system (gärna Optimizely/Episerver).
* Förmåga att arbeta strukturerat och hålla en röd tråd i kommunikationen, även med många perspektiv och krav (t ex legala) att ta hänsyn till.
* Stark språkkänsla i såväl tal som skrift (svenska).


Meriterande erfarenhet:


* Akademisk examen inom t ex ekonomi, kommunikation eller annat som kan bedömas relevant.
* Erfarenhet av e-commerce/digital försäljning ur såväl ett strategiskt som taktiskt perspektiv
* Erfarenhet av arbete inom privatekonomiområdet
* Erfarenhet av arbete med tillgänglighet och klarspråk


**Vad händer nu**


Sista ansökningsdag är 31/10/24. Du kommer att få svara på några urvalsfrågor i din ansökan, urvalsprocessen inkluderar bland annat intervjuer och för slutkandidater även tester med återkoppling. Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan tillsammans med CV så snart du kan. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse.



Placeringsort Stockholm.



Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Frontend Architect
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Front End Architect to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of front-end technologies, exceptional problem-solving skills, and the ability to design and implement scalable, high-performance web applications. As a Front End Architect, you will, along with our Head of Engineering, be responsible for setting the technical direction for our front-end development practices, ensuring best practices are followed, and mentoring other developers as well as collaborating between multiple departments, including sales, and at times leading these discussions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Technical Leadership:** Define and drive the front-end architecture for web applications, ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and performant.
* **Technology Strategy:** Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, and assess their applicability to our projects.
* **Design and Development:** Lead the design and development of complex web applications and user interfaces using modern front-end frameworks and technologies.
* **Code Quality:** Establish and enforce coding standards, best practices, and code reviews to maintain high-quality code.
* **Collaboration:** Work closely with product managers, UX/UI designers, and backend engineers to deliver seamless and robust user experiences.
* **Mentorship:** Mentor and guide junior and mid-level front-end developers, providing technical guidance and support.
* **Performance Optimisation:** Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks in web applications, ensuring optimal performance across different devices and browsers.
* **Documentation:** Create and maintain comprehensive architectural and technical documentation.

**Required Qualifications:**

* **Experience:** 7+ years of experience in front-end development, with at least 3 years in a leadership or architect role.
* **Technical Skills:**
	+ Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+).
	+ Extensive experience with front-end frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
	+ Strong understanding of state management libraries like Redux or MobX.
	+ Experience with build tools and bundlers like Webpack, Babel, and npm/yarn.
	+ Familiarity with version control systems, particularly Git.
	+ Knowledge of RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
	+ Understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and solutions.
	+ Experience with performance optimization techniques and tools.
	+ Familiarity with testing frameworks and methodologies (e.g., Jest, Mocha, Cypress).
	+ Experience with micro-frontends architecture.
* **Soft Skills:**
	+ Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
	+ Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	+ Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
	+ Self-motivated with a passion for continuous learning and improvement.
	+ Ability to clearly communicate in English, both verbal and written.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience with server-side rendering (e.g., Next.js, Nuxt.js).Knowledge of web accessibility standards and best practices.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
* Experience in PWA eCommerce frameworks (PWA Studio, Vue Storefront, etc)

title: Digital Marketing Manager hos Handelsbanken
description:
* *Ansök senast: 31 oktober 2024*
* *Stockholm*
* *Hybrid*
***Arbetsuppgifter***
---------------------

*Vill du bli del av vårt framgångsrika team? Hos oss på* *Handelsbanken kommunikation och marknad i teamet insikter och otimering arbetar vi med hela den digitala kundresan där målet är att våra kanaler nyttjas effektivt och kontinuerligt förbättras baserat på data och analyser. Genom data och insikter omvandlar vi affärs- och kundbehov till kommunikation och flöden för befintliga och potentiella kunder. I denna roll har du möjlighet att påverka såväl resultat som arbetssätt för detta område.*

***Ditt team***  



*Vårt team har åtta personer med roller som business manager, UX-designer, ma-campaign manager, och innehållstrateg.* *Vi arbetar med hela spektra: från externa köpta kanaler till våra egna kanaler, som webb, app, e-post och det personliga mötet på våra bankkontor. Vi har en passion för innehåll och konvertering som kan engagera och vägleda våra kunder genom alla våra digitala mötesplatser och plattformar.*

***Din roll***  

*I rollen som Digital Marketing Manager har du det övergripande ansvaret för den trafik- och konverteringsdrivande strategin för externa kanaler, där stor vikt läggs på att utveckla och implementera strategier för sökmotoroptimering (SEO) och sökmotormarknadsföring (SEM). Uppdraget innefattar att säkerställa ett effektivt samspel med våra externa kanaler, såsom paid sociala medier och Google ads, i syfte att skapa effekt samt säkerställa att dessa linjerar med bankens KPI:er och affärsmål.*

*Du omvandlar resultatinriktat affärsstrategi till trafikdrivande initiativ, och insikter till aktiviteter, vilka du genom din analytiska förmåga analyserar och optimerar löpande. Du kommer att samarbeta med ett dynamiskt team av experter – från konverteringsspecialister och analytiker till content managers och projektledare, där du säkerställer ett effektivt samarbete. Resultat och insikter rapporterar du kontinuerligt internt inom Handelsbanken, till givna stakeholders.*

*Vi arbetar enligt en agil metodik.*

***Vi har riktigt bra förmåner***
---------------------------------

* *Tjänstepension*
* *Vinstdelningssystem*
* *Gruppförsäkring*
* *Friskvårdsbidrag*
* *Bidrag vid föräldraledighet*
* *Banktjänster*
* *Banking services*
* *Benefit in connection with parental leave*
* *Health promotion subsidy*
* *Group insurance*
* *Occupational pension*
* *Profit-sharing scheme*
***Kvalifikationer***
---------------------

***Din profil***  



*För att lyckas i rollen som Digital Marketing Manager hos oss på Handelsbanken ser vi att du har:*

* *En relevant högskoleutbildning inom marknadsföring, kommunikation, ekonomi eller liknande*
* *Flera års erfarenhet inom digital marknadsföring, med särskilt fokus på trafikanskaffning, SEM och SEO*
* *Erfarenhet av att arbeta med plattformar för analys och optimering*
* *Erfarenhet av ett agilt arbetssätt.*

*Erfarenhet från liknande roller inom bank- eller finanssektorn kan vara en fördel, men ej ett krav.*

*För att lyckas och bli framgångsrik i rollen som Digital Marketing Manager krävs en djup förståelse för SEM och SEO, inklusive verktyg som Google Ads och andra betalda sökplattformar & Sociala Medier. Du har erfarenhet av att driva och koordinera projekt där du samarbetar med specialister och projektledare, samt av att omvandla insikter till konkreta initiativ och aktiviteter som driver resultat. Du är självgående i analysverktyg för att genomföra övergripande analyser. Du samarbetar effektivt med affärsområden, intressenter och externa partners där du genomgående uppfattas som tydlig och strukturerad.*

*Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning som inleds med 6 månaders provanställning och är placerad i Stockholm.*

***Vi erbjuder***

* *en trygg och stabil arbetsgivare*
* *dynamiskt och stimulerande arbete*
* *work-life balance*
* *kompetens- och karriärutveckling*
* *inkluderande- och jämställd arbetsmiljö*
* *konkurrenskraftigt förmånspaket*

***Kontaktuppgifter***

***Chef:*** *Johan Mannerstråle, +46(0)730329568, johan.mannerstrale@handelsbanken.se*

***Välkommen med din ansökan***


  
**Om företaget**
----------------

Hos oss får du ett stort eget ansvar och möjlighet att påverka din egen och bankens framtida utveckling. Våra olika perspektiv, insikter och innovativa idéer utgör en grund för hur vi tillsammans bygger vidare banken för framtiden. För oss är utveckling allt och när du utvecklas, utvecklas banken.

Genom stark lokal förankring, ett decentraliserat arbetssätt och ett långsiktigt perspektiv skapar vi hållbara relationer genom livets olika skeenden. Hos oss på Handelsbanken är alla viktiga. Vi kommer från olika platser med olika bakgrund, erfarenhet och utbildning. Tillsammans är vi Handelsbanken.

title: Senior Product Designer (Studio)
description:
**Company Overview:**


We are a top-notch venture-building company with a strong focus on driving innovation in the finance area. Through our unique DNA in building new, innovative companies, we aim to have a global impact by creating enterprises that deliver real value to customers and communities. Our vision is based on creating an ecosystem where experience, creativity, engagement, synergy, and solid validation form the foundation for sustainable, long-term success.

**About the project:**

Studio operates as an incubator with a primary focus on identifying and validating new product ideas. The process begins with internal market analysis and the search for innovative concepts. Once an idea is identified, it undergoes practical validation. If successful, the team moves on to developing an MVP. Each project, from idea to MVP, typically takes about three months. The Studio Project's goal is to efficiently verify ideas and create MVPs for further development or scaling.

 **About the role:**


We're searching for a Senior UX Designer who's more than just an idea person—you're a doer, a Trailblazer eager to transform early-stage product ideas into real solutions our customers love. If you excel in the face of uncertainty and have a talent for seeing opportunities where others see gaps, this role is tailor-made for you.


The role sits in our dynamic and high-performance Studio where you will take inception & early stage ideas and turn them into simple, scalable, and yet powerful prototypes and designs using rapid prototyping and Lean UX methods. You are a key asset in a fast-paced environment with lots of context switching, where you are at the start and forefront of product discovery.


**What do we expect from you?**

* **Lead the Way:** Take the helm of very early product concepts, crafting scrappy, user-centric designs that can be quickly brought to market. You are assertive, self starting and comfortable with ambiguity, you won’t sit back until tasks are handed to you. You are eager to define the path forward. Your ability to prototype and refine products directly will be crucial.
* **Curious by nature:** Your curiosity about our customers and the market and your creativity is a combination that leads you to think outside the box. You are not afraid to try new things, frameworks or methods to see if you can results quicker or better. You can work off a design brief and discover where design adds most value.
* **Make Swift Decisions:** You are a user-centered thinker who acts quickly and thoughtfully. You don’t wait until the end of deadlines to deliver. You make swift design decisions, balancing the need for speed with the quality of experience, to outpace competitors and delight users.
* **Collaborate for Success:** You are a team player who thrives in collaborative environments. This role is all about early-stage startups, which means you wear multiple hats to get the job done. Working closely with research, product, and engineers, you have a general interest in building startups, not just performing your own specialization.
* **Strategic Risk-Taking:** Know when and where to cut corners without accruing significant design or product debt, maintaining a focus on delivering value. You understand where AI tools can help you gain speed & value.
* **New Horizons**: You are comfortable navigating the unknown and ready to define new paths. This role is not about optimization but focuses heavily on discovery. This means being highly adaptable and able to work off assumptions to validate them.
* **Rapid results:** You are a seasoned UX designer (5+ years) with a portfolio that speaks to your ability to bring early-stage ideas to fruition by applying Lean UX and Rapid Prototyping methods. Ideally, you have an incubator, accelerator or early startup experience.
* **Pro-totype:** You are proficient with Figma and creating interactive prototypes with no-code tools like Framer, Protopie etc.

**Why it’s worth a try – advantages of working in ICEO:**

* **Salary 4 200 - 5 400 EUR/ month (on a B2B agreement)**
* As part of your B2B contract, you can use up to 38 + 14 days/year of paid interruption in the provision of your services,
* We are a remote-first company, so you can work from wherever you want.
* We offer semi-flexible working hours – we just want you to be available from 11 AM to 3 PM, organization of the rest of your working day is up to you.
* You can participate in our decision-making process and have an impact on our actions.
* You will work in a company with a well-established position in the market and cooperate with professionals in multiple fields.
* We specialize in innovative finance solutions using Web 3.0 and Big Data – the innovative sector that opens up ample opportunities for your development.
* We cover expenses on co-working space (to a reasonable extent).
* You receive a set of equipment, which is necessary for you to perform your duties.
* Each employee based in Poland receives a private healthcare Medicover Premium and Multisport Premium package.
* You can use our training program for your development – we also have an internal library, which is regularly expanded with new publications.
* At least once a year we meet each other on the company integration where you can meet your co-workers in person.

**Recruitment process:**

* **Resume and portfolio check** - we do it in 3 days
* **Screening with recruiter** - (45 mins) - we will tell you about us and our projects and ask you basic questions about your experience to check if it’s a match :)
* **Meet the design team**- (1 hour) - Interview meeting with designers to present an assignment case we send, with an actual Studio project.
* **Final Meeting: Meet the leadership team** - (1 hour) - meeting with the team: Head of Design / Head of Product and/or Tech Lead to discuss collaboration approach and cultural fit.

title: App Engineer (Music Experience)
description:
### **About us**


Soundtrack is a B2B scale-up company providing music streaming services to more than 80,000 businesses in over 70 countries, from the café round the corner to bigger brands like Joe & The Juice, Toni & Guy and TAG Heuer.


The company consists of 90+ talented, motivated and humble employees. We believe in product-led growth, where the product is the primary driver of customer acquisition, conversion and expansion. Our headquarters are located in central Stockholm (Odenplan).

### **The role**


As an app engineer in the Music Experience team, you’ll be working on a wide range of user-centric projects together with other engineers, product owners, UI/UX designers, machine learning experts, researchers, music experts and analysts.


Music is the core of Soundtrack’s product. The Music Experience team is a vertical team that is dedicated to ownership and development of all music features, like music onboarding, home, search, stations, user created playlists, schedules and artist/album/playlist detail pages. The team owns the features end to end, from UX/UI to APIs, databases, and machine learning.


Your primary focus will be to work on new features and continuous improvements for our apps built on React Native (with TypeScript). We are a data driven team and will continuously iterate based on insights, A/B testing and qualitative user feedback. Ideas can come from anyone, data is the final judge.


You can check out the How it works page to see what kind of features you will be working on or download our app and sign up for a free trial to get a first hand experience.

### **Responsibilities**

* Building, releasing and continuously improving existing features together with UI/UX designers, researchers and analysts.
* Developing and maintaining consistent and reusable UI components/libraries used by multiple teams
* Contribute to the team’s vision, strategy and agenda
* Helping the team grow as a whole by sharing knowledge and lifting each other up

### **About you**


We're always looking to work with people who are friendly, professional, humble, open, and with a passion for details. You are probably not a stranger to describing yourself as:

* Self-sustaining – you can work independently, taking initiatives and planning your own time
* Curious – you enjoy learning new things to grow both professionally as well as on a personal level
* A good communicator – you enjoy discussing different solutions and strategies for technical challenges
* Agile – you feel comfortable in a dynamic environment where focus lies in what’s important here and now, with the ability to realize when it's time to change the game plan and when to stick to it
* Humble – you are an open person, you say what you mean and mean what you say
* Street smart – crafty, able to build solutions with limited resources
* Not a perfectionist – but disciplined and methodical in your approach to solving problems

### **Mandatory requirements**

* You feel at home building robust, maintainable mobile/web apps
* An eye for UI: you enjoy turning a great design into a great feature
* Strong proficiency in TypeScript and JavaScript
* You’ve worked with React and React Native before
* Comfortable with Git, Node, (p)npm and RN/browser dev tools

### **Meriting experience (not required)**

* General interest in music and/or music technology
* iOS, Android, Mac, and/or Windows app development
* Modern, accessible and performant web development
* GraphQL APIs and libraries (we use Apollo)
* Automated testing (especially front-end), for example with Jest/Vitest and Playwright
* Basic knowledge of functional programming
* Experience setting up JS tooling like Vite / Webpack / Expo / Nx or similar
* Backend development (our backend is primarily built in Python, Scala ang Go)
* Container based deployments using Docker/Kubernetes

### **Employee benefits**

* You have the freedom to decide where you work the best with our Work From Anywhere program with a one-off setup bonus included
* Generous pension plan
* Yearly budget for health, wellness and personal development
* Laptop and mobile phone of your choice with included cellular subscription
* Regular social activities such as team events, meet ups, after works and off-sites
* Daily breakfast served at the office

title: UX Researcher som vill skapa framtidens användarupplevelser
description:
Är du en passionerad UX Researcher som drivs av att skapa tjänster baserade på djupa användarinsikter och marknadsanalys? Vår kund söker nu dig som vill vara med och utveckla innovativa och kommersiellt framgångsrika tjänster. I denna roll får du möjligheten att arbeta tvärfunktionellt och sätta användarens behov i centrum, samtidigt som du formar framtidens hälso- och vårdtjänster.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 21/10-2024
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som UX Researcher kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i att driva kundinsiktsarbetet och säkerställa att våra tjänster inte bara möter användarnas behov, utan också har stark kommersiell potential. Du kommer att genomföra användarstudier, analysera marknader och konkurrenter, samt arbeta tätt med teamet för att validera och förbättra produkter och tjänster. Ditt arbete kommer vara avgörande för att säkerställa att våra tjänster är relevanta, användarvänliga och kommersiellt gångbara.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa hälsotjänster som gör skillnad för både företag och privatpersoner
  
* En dynamisk och tvärfunktionell arbetsmiljö där du får stort ansvar för att driva kundinsiktsarbetet
  
* En roll där du får möjlighet att påverka både tjänsternas utveckling och framgång
  
* En stöttande arbetsplats med fokus på personlig utveckling och ständiga förbättringar
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Genomföra user research kring tjänsters användarpotential och kommersiella värde
  
* Analysera marknaden och konkurrenters erbjudanden, både nationellt och internationellt
  
* Utveckla hypoteskoncept för nya hälsotjänster för olika målgrupper
  
* Driva behovsanalyser och säkerställa att tjänster är anpassade efter användarnas förväntningar
  
* Utföra användartester och A/B-tester för att validera och optimera användarupplevelser
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av UX Research, användarstudier och insiktsarbete
  
* Vana att arbeta med både kvalitativa och kvantitativa metoder för att samla och analysera data
  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta tvärfunktionellt i team och kommunicera insikter tydligt
  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med hypoteser och användartester
  
* God förståelse för hur användarinsikter bidrar till framgångsrika tjänster
  
* Förmåga att skapa tjänster utifrån användarens behov och marknadens krav
  


  


 Som person är du analytisk och nyfiken, med en stark förmåga att förstå användares behov och beteenden. Du är kommunikativ och trivs med att samarbeta i tvärfunktionella team där du delar dina insikter och driver utvecklingen framåt. Du har ett kommersiellt fokus och ser till att tjänsterna inte bara är användarvänliga utan även konkurrenskraftiga på marknaden. Din empatiska förmåga och ditt intresse för människor gör att du alltid sätter användaren i centrum, samtidigt som du har en stark affärsmässig förståelse.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Sabrin Kanone eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107676

title: Product Designer
description:
**Why join us?** 




 Join our dynamic community where core values like Passion, Collaboration, and Challenge come alive through events like Level-up Hackathons, health months, Friday beers, and inspiring webinars.
 



 At Bannerflow, we're reshaping the SaaS landscape, delivering over 6 billion ads monthly to 500 million devices globally. Our platform empowers enterprise brands, making in-house advertising at scale seamless and user-friendly. Leading the Creative Management Platforms category, we prioritize global customer satisfaction.
 



  





**About The Role** 




 We are now extending the design team and are looking for a UX-heavy Product Designer to help the Bannerflow product become even more intuitive. We are a marketing hub enabling some of the world's most famous brands to accelerate their online marketing.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Make sure our users, guide our direction and prioritize today’s customer needs informed by user research and data.
* Deep understanding of our business and how it is interrelated with design decisions.
* Ensure that your designs are commercially grounded
* Work cross-functional with tech, product, and other relevant teams to provide elegant solutions to UX and UI challenges.
* Communicate your ideas through high quality concepts and prototypes, knowing when pixel-perfect attention detail is required, and when low-fi sketches will get the job done.
* Provide developers with clear design specifications making sure your designs are understood and implemented as expected.



  





**About You** 




 We believe you craft products rooted in user data and insights, turning complexity into intuitive, satisfying designs. You are also:
 


* Creative and innovative, yet structured person with 5+ years of experience
* You have previously worked with tricky UX challenges in complex digital products.
* You excel at balancing detail orientation with a focus on the big picture
* Your expertise lies in simplifying complex workflows into intuitive designs
* You are open to feedback and dedicated to delivering optimal solutions for users
* You are a team player and share Bannerflow’s belief that working together is the best way to create value for our customers
* Experience in a fast-growing B2B/SaaS company is seen as a big plus.



  





**Why Bannerflow?** 




 We believe that our employees are the key to our success and we are dedicated to building a positive and supportive work environment where our employees can thrive and grow. In our hybrid workplace located in Stockholm, you’ll work on innovative projects alongside collaborative colleagues. Enjoy a competitive compensation package, and inclusive benefits including pension (ITP1), health care insurance and parental leave top-up.
 



 We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities.
 



 Come aboard and help shape the future of UX-design with us!

title: Principal Product Designer
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, Retail, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*ZEOS is part of Zalando, leveraging the company’s infrastructure, technology, and expertise to build an operating system for fashion & lifestyle. Established in 2023, ZEOS is developing tools that allow brands and retailers to manage their multi-channel business in one place. We aim to enable seamless e-commerce across Europe from new market entry and expansion to optimization and business steering. The first ZEOS product is called ZEOS Fulfilment, and it gives brands and retailers the ability to fulfil their multi-channel sales using one stock pool, one carrier integration, and one user interface. Being a small unit within a big company enables us to act fast, but with the backup from one of the leading online platforms for fashion and lifestyle in Europe.*
 Over the last years, we learned at Zalando that solving fulfilment related challenges for the good of our merchants helps us to fuel the growth of our platform.
   

  

 Strengthened by this successful growth, we have started the next step in our journey - expanding our business outside of the Zalando ecosystem, exploring both physical and digital services. Zalando launched the ZEOS brand last year (short for Zalando E-commerce Operating System), aiming to build an operating system for the fashion and lifestyle industry that enables brands and retailers to manage their multi-channel business across Europe within one unified platform.
   

  

 As a Principal Product Designer in the ZEOS Design & Research team, you will be responsible for customer-facing digital experiences for our ZEOS Logistics service offerings. Your joint mission is to empower fashion and lifestyle brands to expand their business and increase their profitability across multiple marketplaces and countries throughout Europe through ZEOS.
   

  

 Using your excellent craft skills and seasoned experience, you will design 0 to 1 experiences that empower brands and retailers to steer their multi-channel logistics for their business from our ZEOS digital touchpoints. This is an important role that will help shape the vision for the user experiences for ZEOS, and requires strong foundational UX skills, exceptional stakeholder management, experience in workshop facilitation, and in crafting and evangelising design strategies and visions.
   

  

**WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)**
* You would work with cross-functional teams (product managers, product researchers, fellow designers, & developers) to drive the design vision and strategy for our new multichannel offering that will deliver the best possible experience for both our merchants and their end customers.
* You’ll lead the design of complex customer journeys that cut across multiple pillars, services and teams.
* You’ll help lead stakeholders and team members towards innovative and engaging solutions by conducting design thinking workshops and design sprints that leverage user research.
* You’ll apply strategic thinking to visualise ideas and concepts and communicate them effectively and compellingly for internal stakeholders, partners and customers
* You’ll work to validate and refine concepts with internal and external stakeholders including actual merchants and end users
* You’ll lead by example by producing high-quality work no matter how big or small the task may be.
* You’ll foster design excellence by helping to set the bar for design quality through your own work, and will mentor fellow designers via rituals such as critiques and office hours.


**WE’D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF**
* Experience You are a seasoned design professional with B2B experience that has led the design for complex projects which have delivered valuable end-to-end experiences to your users. You aren’t afraid of ambiguity and you are inspired to dive deep and solve complex and meaningful problems that resonate with customers and their end users. You are adept at bringing various threads together into a unified design strategy that can be understood and executed on by product teams.
* Collaboration You work collaboratively with product managers, engineers, stakeholders and users to understand and define the key problems and desired experiences for solutions, owning the design thread from discovery through delivery.
* Curiosity You are curious about the industry in which you work and the needs of your customers, which allows you to creatively solve their problems.
* Craft You possess expert knowledge in the end-to-end product design process, demonstrating a command of product and design strategy, distillation of problem statements, user needs, journey mapping, wireframing, prototyping, user testing, and the creation of high fidelity visuals. You know how to bring everything together in the form of useful solutions and usable and delightful interactions for our users.
* Experimentation You have a generative approach, strive to solve problems in the best way possible through iteration, leveraging data and insights to drive future iterations and features.
* Delivery You scope and define deliverables and ensure developers have everything they need to build the designed solution. You ensure a remarkable quality of what goes live.
* Empathy You have the mindset and methodologies to understand your customers, colleagues and employees.
* Storytelling You bring not just users but also stakeholders and employees on a journey, enabling them to truly understand the end customer and vision and experience you are setting out to deliver, and the ‘why’ behind your design decisions.


**OUR OFFER**
 Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
   

  

  

* Employee shares program
* 40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
* 2 paid volunteering days a year
* Hybrid working model with 60% (or more) remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
* Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
* 27 days of vacation a year (for Zalando SE)
* Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
* Family services, including counseling and support
* Health and wellbeing options (including Gympass)
* Mental health support and coaching available


 Learn all about Zalando and our values here https //jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh\_src=22377bdd1us

title: Erfaren och kreativ UX Designer
description:
Är du en passionerad UX Designer som älskar att skapa sömlösa, användarcentrerade digitala upplevelser? Vår kund, en ledande aktör inom design och användarupplevelser, söker nu dig som vill vara med och forma framtidens kundresor inom hälsa och vård. Här får du chansen att sätta din prägel på marknaden och vara en del av ett kreativt designteam som strävar efter att alltid sätta kunden i centrum. Om du har några års erfarenhet på nacken - sök redan idag!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, långsiktigt
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 21/10-2024
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som UX Designer kommer du att arbeta med vår kunds Hälsa & vård-app, där fokus ligger på att utveckla intuitiva och användarvänliga lösningar för kunder med sjukvårdsförsäkring. Du kommer att arbeta tvärfunktionellt i nära samarbete med andra designers, utvecklare och intressenter för att säkerställa att designen möter både kundernas och affärens behov. Här får du möjlighet att vara en nyckelspelare i ett agilt team och påverka produktutvecklingen från idé till lansering.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En kreativ och inspirerande arbetsmiljö med stöttning från ett erfaret designteam på ca 40 digitala designers
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa lösningar inom hälsa och vård
  
* En arbetsplats som värdesätter kunskapsutbyte, feedback och ständiga förbättringar
  
* En inkluderande kultur där vänlighet och empati värderas högt
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Utifrån kundbehov och affärsmål ta fram lösningar Ta fram lösningar
  
* Genomföra användartester
  
* Driva produktutvecklingen framåt och vara användarens röst i teamet
  
* Designa för en helhet, med fokus på samspel mellan kanaler och produkter
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Minst fyra års erfarenhet av att skapa digital design
  
* Relevant utbildning inom UX eller design
  
* Förmåga att både följa etablerade designmönster och tänka utanför ramarna
  
* Driv att utmana och utveckla arbetssätt och processer
  
* Behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt, gärna enligt SAFe-ramverket
  


  


 För att lyckas i denna roll som UX Designer bör du vara en engagerad lagspelare som trivs med att arbeta i ett team och vågar framföra dina idéer. Du har förmågan att tänka strategiskt och fungerar som en stark ambassadör för användarna. Din kreativitet gör att du inte bara följer designmönster utan också vågar tänka utanför ramarna för att hitta innovativa lösningar. Samtidigt har du ett öga för detaljer och säkerställer att varje del av designen håller hög kvalitet.
   

 Med ett starkt inre driv ser du möjligheter att utmana och förbättra arbetssätt och processer.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
