title: Senior IT-drifttekniker i Microsoftmiljö sökes!
description:
Vi söker dig med en stark teknisk kompetens och en brinnande passion för att leverera värde genom stabil och säker IT. Här får du jobba med avancerade Microsoftlösningar både på server och klientnivå i en långsiktig tjänst.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, långsiktigt
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Så snart som möjligt
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vi söker dig med en stark teknisk kompetens och en brinnande passion för att leverera värde genom stabil och säker IT. Hos vår kund får du inte bara möjligheten att fortsätta utvecklas inom ditt område, utan också chansen att vara en nyckelspelare i vår kunds framgångssaga. Företaget är en organisation med ICT-lösningar i teknikens framkant och produkter och tjänster av hög kvalitet.
 


  


 Som IT-drifttekniker hos vår kund, kommer du att ingå i ett dedikerat team som har ansvaret för att sköta den tekniska förvaltningen och driften av kritiska sourcingtjänster. Genom att följa ITIL-standarden och använda din expertis inom konfiguration, drift och felsökning av IT-infrastruktur, kommer du att säkerställa att våra kunder upplever en sömlös och effektiv IT-drift.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En långsiktig tjänst som inleds som ett konsult uppdrag genom Academic Work men där tanken är att man blir anställd direkt hos företaget på sikt
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Djupgående erfarenhet av arbete med Windows Server OS i samtliga versioner
  
* Avancerade kunskaper i konfiguration och felsökning av Windows-operativsystem
  
* Kompetens inom Active Directory Services inklusive DNS, ADFS, NPS, PKI och certifikat
  
* Grundläggande kunskaper inom nätverksteknik
  
* Färdigheter i Script och PowerShell
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Certifieringar inom Microsoftprodukter
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* **Ansvarstagande**
  
* **Social**
  
* **Ordningsam**
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Nils Norgren eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107446

title: ERP Systems Architect
description:
**Introduction to the Position** 




 Our client, based in Stockholm, is embarking on an exciting finance transformation journey and is in the process of implementing Workday Financials as their ERP system. To support this transformation, they are seeking a highly skilled ERP Systems Architect.
 



  





 This role is critical in ensuring the successful integration and optimization of Workday Financials within their organization. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in ERP systems architecture and a strong understanding of financial processes. This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of a major transformation initiative.
 



  





**Your Responsibilities** 



* Lead the architecture and design of the Workday Financials ERP system implementation.
* Collaborate with finance and IT teams to gather requirements and develop comprehensive ERP solutions.
* Ensure seamless integration of Workday Financials with existing systems and third-party applications.
* Provide technical leadership and guidance throughout the implementation process.
* Develop and maintain system documentation, including architecture diagrams and data flow models.
* Conduct system performance evaluations and recommend improvements.
* Stay updated with the latest Workday Financials features and functionalities, and advise on their implementation.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to ERP systems.
* Conduct training sessions and provide support to end-users to maximize system utilization.



  





**Desired Qualifications** 



* Proven experience as an ERP Systems Architect or in a similar role.
* In-depth knowledge of ERP systems, particularly Workday Financials.
* Strong understanding of financial processes and requirements.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Experience with system integration and data management.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.
* Professional certifications in ERP systems architecture or Workday Financials are a plus.



  





 Apply online/via LinkedIn or email your CV to oliver@systemsaccountants.com.
 



  





 For more information on this and related ERP, HCM, and Digital Finance career opportunities, or to understand how we can support you, please contact Oliver Steele at SystemsAccountants: oliver@systemsaccountants.com.

title: Head of IT Infrastructure
description:
**Are you our new Head of IT Infrastructure?** 




 Are you a visionary leader with a passion for building and maintaining world-class IT infrastructure? Do you have the expertise to lead a team in delivering robust, scalable, and secure IT solutions? We are looking for a
 **Head of IT Infrastructure** 
 to drive our infrastructure strategy and development, ensuring our technology backbone supports our business growth.
 



  





  





**What will you do:** 




 As the
 **Head of IT Infrastructur** 
 e, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of our IT infrastructure, including data centers, networks, servers, workplace and cloud services. Your leadership will be key in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and security of our IT environment, enabling our business to thrive in a competitive landscape. You will collaborate closely with your peers in Operations, Service Management and Development, and our various partners.
 



  




* **Strategic Leadershi** 
 p: Develop and execute a comprehensive IT infrastructure strategy that aligns with the company’s business objectives and digital transformation goals.
* **Infrastructure Managemen** 
 t: Oversee the management and optimization of our data centers, networks, servers, storage, and cloud platforms.
* **Team Leadershi** 
 p: Lead, mentor, and grow a team of IT professionals, fostering a culture of excellence, collaboration, and innovation.
* **Security & Complianc** 
 e: Ensure the highest levels of security and compliance across all IT infrastructure, proactively addressing risks and implementing best practices.
* **Vendor Managemen** 
 t: Manage relationships with key technology vendors and service providers, ensuring the best value and performance.
* **Disaster Recovery & Business Continuit** 
 y: Develop and maintain robust disaster recovery and business continuity plans to ensure the resilience of our IT systems.
* **Budget Managemen** 
 t: Oversee the IT infrastructure budget, ensuring cost-effective solutions while delivering high-quality services.



  





**What we´re looking for:** 



* **Extensive Experience:** 
 10+ years of experience in IT infrastructure, with at least 5 years in a leadership role.
* **Technical Experti** 
 se: Deep knowledge of IT infrastructure components, including networks, servers, storage, virtualization, and cloud services.
* **Leadership Skil** 
 ls: Proven ability to lead and inspire a diverse team of IT professionals, driving performance and innovation.
* **Strategic Thinki** 
 ng: Strong ability to develop and execute infrastructure strategies that align with business objectives.
* **Problem-Solving Abili** 
 t
 **y:** 
 Excellent analytical skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex infrastructure issues and implement effective solutions.
* **Security & Compliance Knowled** 
 ge: In-depth understanding of IT security principles and regulatory requirements.



**Location:** 
 Stockholm or Gothenburg. We offer the option of hybrid working. Travelling will be required.
 



  





**Why Intrum?** 



* Working for us means working for the international market leader. This not only sounds great but also means collaborating with the best people, the most exciting clients, the latest market innovations, and the highest ethical standards.
* Our business is about helping others. We assist individuals in debt to get out of difficult situations and help companies get paid so they can grow, employ, and prosper. This, in turn, positively impacts the entire economy. You become an essential part of this circuit with us, giving your job at Intrum a deeper meaning, regardless of your role or title.



  





**We Offer:** 



* A challenging, exciting, and developing position in an international company with growth ambitions.
* Highly motivated and skilled co-workers globally.
* Being part of a supportive culture where effort counts.
* Opportunity for professional growth and development.



  





**About Intrum:** 




 Intrum is the industry-leading provider of credit management services across 20 markets in Europe. By helping companies to get paid and support people with their late payments, Intrum leads the way to a sound economy and plays a critical role in society at large.Intrum has circa 10,000 dedicated professionals who serve around 80,000 companies across Europe. At Intrum we consider everybody to be a leader. We lead ourselves when collaborate to meet the needs of our clients and customers. We are all accountable to our actions as well as trust and care for each other. This makes us all leaders, independent of role or responsibility, and this is reflected in our 3 leadership principles: Deliver Impact, Inspire Trust and Embrace Growth.
 



  





**How to Apply:** 
 If you are ready to take on a critical leadership role in IT infrastructure, we would love to hear from you! : If you are interested in this position and believe you have the right qualifications, please send your English CV and a cover letter via the “apply button”
 



 \*\*Please note that as a multinational company, we have Talent Acquisition Partners in multiple locations. You might receive a call from our recruiters with a Spanish, Latvian or Greek phone number.\*\*
 



 At Intrum we strive to create a diverse and inclusive workplace. We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Graduate consultant for August 2025, Gothenburg or Stockholm
description:
Are you passionate about a career in management consulting where you make a difference and create sustainable results? Are you pragmatic and just overall a great human being? And are you among the top candidates in your year? Then we could be the right match for you!
   

  

**Experience**
* A relevant master’s degree
* Among the top candidates in your year


**Keywords**
* A good sense of humour
* Ability to break down complex issues
* Converting analyses into specific initiatives
* Enthusiasm and teamwork


**Location** 
 : Sweden
   

  

**You will be**
* Working side by side with skilled and experienced colleagues who are leaders and experts as well as with young ambitious consultants as yourself
* Learning the tools necessary to become one of the best management consultants out there
* Part of an informal culture with a flat hierarchy, where we cooperate across business areas and managerial levels. In Valcon, we pull together
* Cooperating on projects in some of the most interesting European and international companies
* Working on projects in Sweden and abroad
* Gaining project experience and a consulting toolbox
* Working with a steep learning curve
* Part of an attractive graduate programme, allowing you insights into more than one area of our business
* Offered a buddy to guide and advise you


**Can you say yes to the following?**
* Graduating with a relevant master’s degree in 2024/2025
* Have the ability to break down complex issues
* Capable of converting analyses into specific initiatives and improvements so that we can create results for our clients together
* Interested in taking responsibility from day one
* Have the courage, confidence and maturity necessary to enter the client’s world directly
* Willing to travel in Europe and overseas for international projects
* Excellent proficiency in written and spoken Swedish and English
* A good sense of humour
* A desire to work with projects all the way from strategy to implementation


**We offer you**
 We have developed training programmes for our young professionals to ensure that you gain the competences and training you need to make a world-class consultant. No matter which of our offices you call your home base, you will receive the feedback and training necessary to take your skills to the next level and to ensure that your personal and professional development is given a continuous power boost.
   

  

 You will become part of a value-driven company where there is room for every individual to thrive. You will get the opportunity to work in a diverse and international environment with an informal culture, in which we cooperate across business areas and levels.
   

  

 Our organisation is flat which encourages us to learn from each other, and we prize excellence and ingenuity but know that both have to be grounded in reality.
   

  

 A workplace in Östra Hamngatan 16 (United Spaces), Gothenburg or in Kungsgatan 9, Stockholm.
   

  

 Our ideal candidate could come from anywhere in the world, but it is important that you have excellent proficiency in English as we are an international company
   

  

**Application**
 Does the graduate programme sound like something for you? Then, please apply below.
   

  

 We will be reviewing applications on an ongoing basis, so please send us your application as soon as possible. If you have any questions regarding this position, please reach out to Hjalmar Grefberg // [email protected]

title: Teknisk Projektledare
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
 
 Till vår myndighetskund söker vi en senior IT-projektledare för att driva ett projekt som syftar till att modernisera och förbättra IT-infrastrukturen. Konsulten kommer att arbeta med att upphandla, etablera, integrera, migrera och driftsätta ny IT-infrastruktur för Trafikförvaltningen. Fokus ligger på att skapa en säker och skalbar IT-miljö med containerisering och CI/CD-processer. Projektet involverar nära samarbete med tekniska specialister, arkitekter och DevOps-team, och det sträcker sig fram till Q1 2026. Erfarenhet av transformationer, migreringar och arbete inom säkerhetskänslig verksamhet är meriterande.
   

**Kvalifikationer** 



* Du har +9 års erfarenhet som projektledare inom IT.
* Du har +5 års erfarenhet som projektledare för IT-projekt inom transformationer, migreringar, implementationer eller uppgraderingar.
* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta i komplexa IT-landskap med många integrerade system.
* Du har erfarenhet av att ta fram krav- och behovsunderlag för design och upphandling.
* Du har erfarenhet av kravverifiering och att leda team i sådant arbete.


 Personliga egenskaper
   


 Vi söker en konsult som är kommunikativ och har lätt för att samarbeta med olika intressenter. Du är lösningsorienterad och ser möjligheter där andra ser hinder, samtidigt som du är analytisk och noggrann i ditt arbetssätt. Med ett starkt helhetsperspektiv kan du både se de större sammanhangen och förstå detaljerna i komplexa projekt. Du arbetar processorienterat, med fokus på effektivitet och kvalitet i alla steg. Dessutom är du nyfiken och framåtlutad, alltid beredd att ta initiativ och driva utvecklingen framåt.
 


 Företagspresentation
   


 Vår kund är en myndighet i Stockholm som arbetar för att underlätta vardagen för invånarna som reser och pendlar. Det som kännetecknar deras verksamhet är det stora engagemanget bland deras medarbetare samt stoltheten över deras samhällsuppdrag.
   




 När du blir en av oss
   


 Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.
 


 Lön
   


 Enligt överenskommelse.
 


 Tillträde och ansökan
   


 Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start så snart som möjligt, och uppdraget förväntas löpa t.o.m. 31-mar-2026 med goda chanser till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters och arbeta som konsult hos vår spännande kund i Stockholm. Uppdraget utförs på plats på kundens kontor på Kungsholmen och arbete på distans är begränsat (men kan ske efter beställarens godkännande).
   

  

 Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format).

title: IT System Administrator
description:
**Who we’re looking for!**
 We’re excited to announce an opportunity for an IT System Administrator Workplace!
   

  

 We are looking for a person that can work in collaboration with our suppliers to offer excellent service. Someone that has a talent of finding simple solutions to complex problems together with the rest of the team and keep our user’s content, as IT System Administrator workplace, you will take ownership of workplace and local, technical support.
   

  

 You’re strongly aligned with our
 **Employee DNA** 
 which celebrates curiosity, collaboration, competence, and customer focus.
   

  

**What does the role look like?**
* Collaboration with external IT services providers for finding the suitable IT equipment,
* Previous experience with: Azure AD, SQL, AD, IAM, Share point, PowerShell scripting and ServiceNow,
* Asset management, purchases, logistics of IT hardware and software licenses according to our user needs,
* Keeping up with trends and development in the workplace area,
* Device security is part of your knowledgebase,
* Workstations, phones and peripherals setup and installation in our order process,
* User support in terms of the operating system and installed applications,
* Updates, patching and supervision of systems repair in the event of failure,
* License management from an operational view,
* Responsible for office IT set up in meeting rooms and workspaces,
* Creating and maintaining documentation of IT systems and services.


**Succeeding the Banqsoft way – Employee DNA**
**Curiosity:** 
 We embrace the 'Why?’ It’s the spark that ignites learning, innovation, and progress
   

  

**Collaboration:** 
 Team players with diverse perspectives have more fun building together
   

  

**Competence:** 
 We're hungry for more! Ever ready for new skills and always seeking to learn
   

  

**Customer Focus:** 
 We're dedicated to enabling our customers' success. We deliver the benefits of technology to make a difference in society, business, and everyday life
   

  

**Are we a great match?**
* To master the role of IT System Administrator Workplace we believe that you have a great experience in workplace with a very good knowledge of Windows and MS O365,
* You are required to have a basic knowledge of computer networking and the ability to think analytically and troubleshoot,
* You are fluent in English with strong communication skills, self-organized and work well both independently as well as in a team,
* You speak Swedish at a communicative level,
* You have probably worked in a smaller organization where you did a little bit of everything,
* At least 3-5 years of experience in similar role is required,
* You have experience with ITSM,
* Strong alignment with our Employee DNA,
* If you enjoy incident management, that is a plus.


 Take the opportunity to join a small effective team, with an opportunity to develop within the support area. If you are a people person and believe this role aligns with your career aspirations, we would very much like to hear from you!
   

  

*Please, send your CV in English.*

title: Presales Solution Consultant, IT Asset Management (ITAM)
description:
**Company Description**
 At ServiceNow, our technology makes the world work for everyone, and our people make it possible. We move fast because the world can’t wait, and we innovate in ways no one else can for our customers and communities. By joining ServiceNow, you are part of an ambitious team of change makers who have a restless curiosity and a drive for ingenuity. We know that your best work happens when you live your best life and share your unique talents, so we do everything we can to make that possible. We dream big together, supporting each other to make our individual and collective dreams come true. The future is ours, and it starts with you.
   

  

 With more than 7,700+ customers, we serve approximately 85% of the Fortune 500®, and we're proud to be one of FORTUNE 100 Best Companies to Work For® and World's Most Admired Companies™.
   

  

 Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.
   

  

 Unsure if you meet all the qualifications of a job description but are deeply excited about the role? We still encourage you to apply! At ServiceNow, we are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all voices are heard, valued, and respected. We welcome all candidates, including individuals from non-traditional, varied backgrounds, that might not come from a typical path connected to this role. We believe skills and experience are transferrable, and the desire to dream big makes for great candidates.
   

  

**Job Description**
**The Team:**
 As a member of the Specialist Solution Consulting Team at ServiceNow, you will have significant impact on our future success by supporting our Technology Workflows product sales. In this role, you will have an opportunity to influence revenue growth for one of the company’s most strategic product lines with support from sales, product management and the executive team. All this in a team of skilled and experienced people with focus on sharing, collaborating and learning from each other to drive innovation.
   

  

**The Role**
 IT Asset Management Solution Consultant is a customer facing domain expert role who will drive innovative business solutions for our customers, by applying your technical and business skills. Being a Solution Consultant, you will partner with sales, solution consulting and the rest of the ServiceNow ecosystem to drive effective sales cycles and help customers achieve success through identification of their business needs and the associated business value and translate that into real-life use cases to create the right solutions. The role is also key for gathering customer feedback for future product innovation. Strong technical, sales and consulting skills as well as the ability to translate technical capabilities into business benefits are crucial for this role.
   

  

**What You Get To Do In This Role**
* Advise customers / prospects to take advantage of the ServiceNow ITAM suite to solve business issues and technical problems preventing them from achieving their goals.
* Inspire with an innovative mindset providing guidance on the future of our ITAM solutions.
* Take a leading role in creation and sharing of best practices and content both to educate colleagues and to help customers to realize value faster.
* Qualify, scope, plan and deliver customer facing activities such as presentations, demos and proof of concepts.
* Promote and educate about ServiceNow technology and industry trends through public, customer and marketing events such as conferences, webinars, executive briefings etc.
* Be the voice of the customer and provide feedback to help product management and engineering teams to shape the roadmap and to better help our customers.
* Be the go-to person in area of focus for market trends and competitive analysis with special skills on differentiation for our ITAM solutions.
* Be the trusted advisor for our ITAM solutions for customers, the market, partners, colleagues and with a consultative mindset coach them towards the value-based decisions.


**Qualifications**
**To be successful in this role, you need to have:**
* Experience driving technical activities in complex organizations managing change and multiple stakeholders at multiple levels.
* Ideally solution consulting and/or presales background in Hardware, Software, Cloud and Enterprise Asset Management domains with understanding and hands-on experience with related tools and processes.
* Understanding of the Asset Management market and current trends.
* Experience working with Software License Compliance & Asset Onboarding and Offboarding processes, Contract and Renewal Management, Licensing Terms and Conditions, and Major Publishers.
* Experience with discovery, inventory, and client distribution technologies.
* Lifelong learner passion about building trustful business relationships.
* Great communication and presentation skills including technical and business concepts, with fluency in English and Swedish
* Excellent interpersonal skills, customer-centric attitude and experience working with diverse team.


 Additional Information
   

  

 ServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status or any other category protected by law.
   

  

 At ServiceNow, we lead with flexibility and trust in our distributed world of work. Click here to learn about our work personas: flexible, remote and required-in-office.
   

  

 If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you may contact us at talent.acquisition@servicenow.com for assistance.
   

  

 For positions requiring access to technical data subject to export control regulations, including Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may have to obtain export licensing approval from the U.S. Government for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by the U.S. Government.
   

  

 Please Note: Fraudulent job postings/job scams are increasingly common. Click here to learn what to watch out for and how to protect yourself. All genuine ServiceNow job postings can be found through the ServiceNow Careers site.
   

  

 From Fortune. © 2022 Fortune Media IP Limited All rights reserved. Used under license.
   

  

 Fortune and Fortune Media IP Limited are not affiliated with, and do not endorse products or services of, ServiceNow.

title: Head of Industry 4.0
description:
Join our Team
   

  

**About This Opportunity**
 NPI & Production is responsible for the global production of Ericsson Radio and RAN Compute products. We are around 4000 employees cross the globe with four Ericsson factories in Nanjing (China), Tallinn (Estonia), Sao Jose dos Campos (Brazil), Dallas (USA) and a staff function in Stockholm (Sweden). Together with the design units we develop and introduce new products (NPI). For the more complex products we do the NPI and production in our own factories and for the less complex and mature products we work together with contract manufacturers (EMS) located close to our customers.
   

  

 We are now looking for a leader for Industry 4.0 within our NPI & Production organization in Ericsson Group Supply.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Lead and coordinate the global Industry 4.0 strategy and execution program together with our four factories
* Lead and develop needed IT architecture and system landscape together with our global IT team
* Drive digital- and data transformation in the global Production landscape
* Drive strategic goals for transformation and execution of key strategic initiatives in Tools and process transformation for production
* Contribute in the NPI & Production leadership team ensuring overall business goals are met


**You will bring**
* Education: Academic degree or the equivalent level of knowledge in whatever way acquired
* Min 10 years of experience (Recruiter to supply)
* Proven track record within the Smart Manufacturing and Industry 4.0 area
* Proven track record and experience in driving digital transformation and change
* Production Process Knowledge
* Strategic and vsionary thinking
* Data driven mindset
* Communication skills in a global environment
* Proven leadership behavior
* Interest and desire to lead and develop people


**Application**
 We look forward to your application with CV in English. We target 40% work-from-home.
   

  

 Last day to apply: 24th of October 2024
   

  

 Please note that we do not accept, proceed, or respond for applications sent via e-mail.
   

  

 If you have specific questions, you are welcome to contact Raheleh Rouhani, Sr. Recruiter at raheleh.rouhani@ericsson.com
   

  

 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 755234
   

  

 ]]>

title: Turnpikes söker IT-profiler!
description:
Är du passionerad inom IT och söker nya utmaningar? Turnpikes erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du kan växa och utvecklas tillsammans med ett team av engagerade kollegor. Välkommen till ett företag i framkant av teknik och innovation!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Turnpikes Sweden
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Turnpikes är en talangfull grupp människor med huvudkontor i Danmark men verksamma över hela världen, som möjliggör digital transformation för företagskunder. Turnpikes värdesätter sina starka relationer, strävar alltid efter att skapa värde och är stolta över sin extremt höga kundnöjdhet från några av världens största företag.
 


  


 Med en ständigt växande kundbas har behovet av ytterligare expansion blivit tydligt. Nu söker vi utvecklare som i en bred roll kommer få ta stort ansvar gentemot den svenska kundbasen. Du kommer att arbeta med tekniska uppgifter relaterade till OpenText Extended ECM (Enterprise Content Management) och leverera kvalitativa konfigurationer till projektteamet som definierar omfattningen och interagerar med slutkunden.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En fot in på ett företag vars tillväxtstrategi är ambitiös och där du får utrymme att växa i karriären
  
* Tydliga utvecklingsplaner och en platt struktur som ger dig tillgång till en stor kunskapsbas
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med banbrytande teknologi och branschledande lösningar
  
* Omfattande förmånspaket
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Arbeta med definierade uppgifter i OpenText Extended ECM, som Web Reports, arbetsflöden, arkivhantering, etc.
  
* Leverera hög kvalitet i konfigurationer, utvecklingar och relaterad dokumentation.
  
* Samarbeta i ett större projektteam och kommunicera med dina kollegor på olika platser i världen.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en relevant universitetsutbildning inom IT
  
* Har en god generell teknisk förståelse
  
* Har erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling
  
* Har grundläggande erfarenhet av databashantering
  
* Kan kommunicera väl på både svenska och engelska
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Stresstolerant
  
* Målmedveten
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Intellektuellt nyfiken
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Turnpikes Sweden**

 Här kan du läsa mer om Turnpikes.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Turnpikes Sweden**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Mikaela Hofstedt eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107628

title: Head of Security and IT Governance
description:
Lendo, part of Lendo Group, is a leading marketplace for loans. On our marketplace people seek guidance, browse, get and manage consumer loans, car loans, credit cards, business loans and mortgages. Today we operate in Scandinavia including 250+ employees working each day to empower people to make smart financial decisions that actually make a difference in their lives. Since our humble beginning back in 2007, we have helped thousands of people get a fair price on loans, get in control and let the lenders compete for their business.
   

  

 Since the launch, we have worked hard to make the market for loans more transparent and digital. After the success in Sweden, we expanded into the Scandinavian countries of Norway and Denmark.
   

  

 Since 2009 Lendo is also a part of the Schibsted family of brands.
   

  

 Lendo has always been about helping people keep control over their personal finances and lenders finding quality customers. As a leader in our category, we have made it easier for people to get a fair price on loans, often reducing their interest substantially.
   

  

 We believe in a market built on trust and transparency. This is why we strive for openness between our customers and partners.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**About Us**
 Join the Tech leadership team at Lendo Group, focusing on building, running and protecting market leading comparison sites for financial products across Scandinavia. Become part of an open-minded, agile, and cross-functional company that loves to solve problems and innovate! At Lendo, everyone can have an impact. Our tech teams work closely with the business, directly contributing to continuously improving our customer experience and our product offerings.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 We’re looking for a visionary leader with a background in security, sourcing, or project management to head a small, focused team. In this role, you will ensure the security, reliability, and compliance of our technical operations, while managing key cloud and SaaS vendors. Your leadership will be essential in securing our infrastructure, scaling operations, and meeting regulatory standards.
   

  

 You will lead both our Security- and Sourcing Managers, taking full accountability for the security and availability of services delivered by external suppliers. This role spans all Lendo Group brands across Sweden, Norway, and Denmark, reporting directly to the CTO.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Join the Tech Leadership Team to drive strategic and operational improvements, balancing security, scalability, and business agility.
* Lead sourcing projects, manage contracts, and set policies for vendor management.
* Ensure cybersecurity and data privacy compliance, particularly GDPR, working closely with cross-functional teams.
* Standardize processes across markets, maintaining internal procedures that ensure efficiency and consistency.
* Develop and execute a security roadmap, identifying and mitigating risks while fostering a strong security culture across all business units.
* Oversee IT governance, with a focus on third-party risk, regulatory compliance (GDPR, DORA), and business alignment.
* Support the development of secure, innovative products, and track security metrics to enhance our security posture.

title: Junior Consultants - Risk & Compliance Consulting Stockholm
description:
*Are you close to graduation or at the beginning of your career? Do you want to work with top tier clients and develop within a firm with great career opportunities? KPMG are now looking for high performing young professionals who want to contribute to the development of our Advisory business area Risk Consulting in Stockholm.*
 As Risk Consultants, we advise our clients in their transformation journeys, and we always seek digital, innovative, and sustainable solutions to our clients’ business challenges.
   

  

 Working at KPMG Risk & Compliance Consulting (RCC) is an excellent way to begin and advance your career. Within RCC Sweden we are a diverse team of around 60 colleagues with experts in Governance, Risk & Compliance, as well as ESG Transformation, Digital Transformation, Internal Control & Internal Audit, Forensic Investigations and Fraud Risk Management. Our diversity both as people and within our competencies makes us a force to be reckoned with in the market. We work with businesses in all sectors of the market, both corporate and in the public sector, with a strong local presence. A profound part of our work is for instance to integrate new technologies, and through digitalization optimize various processes for our clients. At KPMG we are now expanding, therefore we are looking for new coworkers to join our office in Stockholm.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 You'll be part of a global organization and work within various industries and areas, together with competent and inspiring colleagues. Already from the start you'll be part of interesting projects with our clients, working shoulder-to-shoulder with top tier consultants. Our customers vary and you'll be exposed to different sectors of the market and different levels of an organization. Furthermore, you will get a mentor and a dedicated performance manager supporting you in kickstarting your career.
   

  

 Being a Risk Consultant at KPMG involves performing tasks such as:
   

  

* Deliver various risk services to our customers across different sectors of the market
* Identify new business opportunities and being part of sales activities
* Build and maintain client relationships
* Contribute to an inspiring work environment where knowledge-sharing and continuous learning are key
* Develop our operating model within risk consulting, together with inspiring colleagues


 ,
   

  

 If you’re someone with excellent communication skills who has a distinctive business mindset - we believe you could be the right candidate for our team. Further, we see our next teammate as someone who has an analytical way of solving problems and gladly contributes with new ideas and perspectives in both our joint discussions within the team as well as in the conversations with our customers.
   

  

 Our work is organized in teams and therefore we find it important that you’re a team player who can collaborate with all different types of people. We’re very excited to welcome our new recruits to our team and we assure you that you'll get a steep learning curve and valuable experiences from working alongside our clients while targeting their critical challenges, and in addition to that, you will have a lot of fun on the way!
   

  

**In order to succeed in this role, we think that you are:**
* A student expecting to complete your studies by summer 2025, a recent graduate, or a young professional with up to 2 years professional experience from a relevant area
* You have a completed bachelor’s degree in economics/business, law, engineering or equivalent with excellent academic results. A master's degree within a relevant area is meritorious
* A high performer with strong drive and high ambition
* A team player – open minded with ability to network, as well as contributing as an inspirational team member. We value diverse backgrounds in our team
* A person who has personal integrity and ability to exercise sound judgement and common sense
* Fluency in English is expected, multilingual and/or Swedish proficiency is meritorious


**Want to make a difference with us?**
 Applicants are advised to apply as soon as possible, but the latest on the 13th of October. Your application should consist of your CV, cover letter and university grade transcripts. Based on mutual agreement successful candidates will be based in Stockholm and start in August 2025, or as agreed.
   

  

 If you have any questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact Viktor Espeling at viktor.espeling@kpmg.se.
   

  

***We look forward to your application and for new colleagues to join our team!***

title: Customer Support Specialist
description:
*Are you a student looking for a part-time job during your studies?* 




*Do you speak fluent German?* 




  





**ABOUT THE COMPANY** 




 GANT is the future of American Sportswear and has been a pioneer of preppy style since 1949. Founded by the Gantmacher family in the college town of New Haven, Connecticut, GANT revolutionized the way the world dresses by creating American Sportswear icons. Today we continue to challenge convention and make clothes for the courageous, the curious and the creative - a community of people who believe you should never stop learning.
 



 GANT enjoys a global presence in over 70 markets, with 600 stores, 4,000 selected retailers and with a team of 1500 employees globally. We strive to become employer of choice within premium lifestyle and are always looking for new passionate people to join their team.
 



  





**ABOUT THE ROLE** 




 As a Customer Service Agent for the Central Europe markets you will support customers mainly over phone and email. You will help GANTS customers before, during and after a purchase on Monday-Friday 9-17. You will be the first personal contact point to the brand. It will be possible to work half days as well as full-time during summer and winter sale periods.
 



  





**RESPONSIBILITIES** 



* Support customers with queries in relation to orders, products, stores or loyalty programme, to name a few, within the tonality guidelines, which is done primarily via Service Cloud.
* Report any issues to the E-Commerce teams and the Customer Service Manager
* Handover cases and issues handled to the inhouse team



  





**WHO ARE YOU?** 




 To be successful in this role we believe that you speak the German language fluently. Any additional languages are of benefit. It is an advantage if you have previous experience in customer service or working in digital platforms.
 



 But most importantly we believe that you are:
 



 • A solution-oriented fast learner who can handle digital platforms
 



 • Service minded and friendly
 



 • Communicative and not afraid to ask for help
 



  





 Does this sound like something for you? We look forward to your application.
 



  





  





**OTHER INFORMATION:** 




**Start:** 
 As per agreement
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Hybrid solution
 



**Employment form:** 
 This is a part-time consultancy position where you will be hired as a consultant through A-hub.

title: Teknisk Business Analyst till Tre
description:
I denna roll blir du en del av ett agilt utvecklingsteam med ett brett ansvar för hela teknikstacken. Här får du arbeta med lösningar som hanterar våra kunders abonnemang och tjänster. Teamet, Products & Provisioning som är en del av IT Development, utvecklar och förvaltar lösningar för t ex 5G, abonnemangskoncept, smarta enheter, nummerhantering och eSIM. Teamet består av tjugo medlemmar, varav tre arbetar som Teknisk Business Analyst, och tillsammans säkerställer vi att våra kunder får den bästa upplevelsen genom innovativa och högkvalitativa lösningar.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Teknisk Business Analyst hos oss kommer du att spela en central roll i att analysera, bryta ner och driva leveransen av krav från vår produktledning. Du arbetar nära både kravställare och utvecklingsteam i en agil miljö med fokus på kontinuerlig leverans. Din starka analysförmåga och tekniska förståelse gör att du tillsammans med teamet snabbt kan identifiera hur krav kan delas upp för att maximera affärsvärdet. Vid större krav som kräver mycket planering och koordinering tar du ett mer projektledarlikt ansvar som kan innefatta statusrapportering, riskanalys och koordinering av leverans. I rollen ingår även att kontinuerligt förbättra arbetssätt och du kommer att märka att vi är prestigelösa och lösningsorienterade.
   

  

**Du kommer se fram emot att**
* vara del av en lärande kultur där vi erbjuder dig en utmanande miljö där du lär dig nya saker och bidrar med din kompetens
* ingå i ett team med kompetenta och erfarna kollegor som känner stor stolthet i vårt uppdrag
* arbeta på ett företag som levererar kritisk infrastruktur där din insats bidrar direkt till samhällsnyttan och ser till att viktiga funktioner fungerar smidigt
* vara en del av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser enligt Great Place To Work samt att vi är topprankade hos Karriärföretagen av IT-Young Professionals
* tillhöra en arbetsgivare som vill bidra till att kvinnor vill välja och stanna kvar inom teknikbranschen, vi är stolta partners till Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar


**Lite mer om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god teknisk förståelse och som tidigare jobbat i liknande roll hos en teknikavdelning. Du trivs med att samarbeta och stötta dina kollegor, men har också den nödvändiga fingertoppskänslan för att utmana och ställa krav när det behövs. Du kommer ha många kontaktytor internt och därför ser vi att du tycker om att samarbeta och supportera dina kollegor inom organisationen. Din kommunikativa förmåga gör att du enkelt kan förklara komplexa tekniska lösningar på ett begripligt sätt, och du är både strukturerad och resultatinriktad med ett naturligt driv för att få saker gjorda. Eftersom vi jobbar i en internationell miljö är det viktigt att du behärskar engelska flytande, både i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via denna annons och kommer hålla intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du svarar på de frågor vi ställt nedan i samband med att du söker.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: AI Product Specialist to fast growing company
description:
Are you "the engineering type" and enjoying discussing AI solutions with other people. Do you have a deep knowledge about AI and preferably embedded systems, then this might be the perfect role for you!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm City
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, long term
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Grönt jobb
   




**About the role**

 Our client is a fast growing company within the AI and embedded systems industry and are part of one of the worlds largest organisations in producing semiconductors. As they are growing their business they need to hire someone that will work in their sales department adding that extra technical knowledge and engineering mindset.
 


  


 An AI Product Specialist has deep knowledge of the company’s AI-products and technologies, as well as the ability to communicate technical details to customers in an easily understandable way. The focus is to explain and promote the products and concepts, but also educating and supporting customers, which means helping them utilize the product optimally through, for example, workshops and technical training. This also requires an understanding of the customers' business processes and how your AI products can be integrated with them.
 


  


 In this role you will work alongside your colleagues that are bringing in new clients and you will provide them with education and expertise in your products. A typical day for you will probably contain one or a couple of sales meetings with clients talking about your products and how they work. Then you might move on to preparing and hosting a webinar for another client. And in all your tasks you will make use of your technical knowledge and understanding about AI.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* **To work for a company with cutting edge technology in AI and embedded systems**
  
* **A consultant assignment with the ultimate goal to be hired directly at the company**
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Promote the products to clients
  
* Give clients expert guidance in how your AI products can be leveraged by them
  
* Educate clients in how your product works through webinars and workshops
  
* Do technical demonstrations of how the products work
  
* Write technical documentation, web content and marketing material
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* A deep interest and understanding for AI solutions from prior work experience and/or education
  
* An interest in talking about AI technologies for clients and partners
  
* Fluent in English as the company language in English
  
* Education: MsC in engineering within IT and preferably AI
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Experience and knowledge in embedded systems
  
* Experience from working in a customer-facing role B2B
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Nils Norgren or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth2@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107596

title: Senior IT Business Analyst – Data, AI and Analytics
description:
Join us as a Sr. IT Business Analyst, a strategic liaison between IT and business stakeholders from the Digital and Analytics Global Supply Chain Team. This role is an opportunity to develop strategic relationships, find opportunities for IT to partner with the business to achieve and exceed objectives, and drive the delivery of innovative solutions through exceptional business analysis. There's never been a better time to join us as we bring our digital strategy to life.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
 As a Sr. IT Business Analyst, you will be responsible for understanding and prioritizing business requirements from multiple stakeholders and simplify them for easy analysis, solution design and decision making. You will work with colleagues globally across IT and the business to identify the capabilities required to ensure outcomes/requirements are clearly understood and can be delivered. You will contribute to project delivery with Requirements Analysis, Business Process Mapping, functional design and testing. You will also serve as the main point of contact for business collaborators, providing thought leadership, planning, coordination, and management of business demand including prioritization and benefits realization.
   

  

**Essential skills/experience:**
* Minimum of 10 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst
* Minimum of 7 years delivering projects with focus on Data, AI and Analytics
* Practical experience working with / supporting a Supply Chain Function
* Demonstrated experience working as a Business Partner / Liaison between IT and Business stakeholders.
* Deep understanding of data constructs (Mesh, Products, Knowledge Graphs, etc) which go beyond reporting and analytics, as well as hands on expertise in data analysis and business intelligence
* Excellent communication skills (written and speaking) in English


**Desirable skills/experience:**
* Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business Administration, or a related field. A Master's degree is a plus.
* Proven experience in managing and delivering digital projects, with a solid understanding of project management methodologies and tools.
* Deep technical competence, with experience in enterprise-level systems, databases, and analytics platforms.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and provide comprehensive solutions to complex business challenges.
* Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization.
* Experience in leading cross-functional teams and driving collaboration across business and IT domains.


 When we put unexpected teams in the same room, we unleash bold thinking with the power to inspire life-changing medicines. In-person working gives us the platform we need to connect, work at pace and challenge perceptions. That's why we work, on average, a minimum of three days per week from the office. But that doesn't mean we're not flexible. We balance the expectation of being in the office while respecting individual flexibility. Join us in our unique and ambitious world.
   

  

 At AstraZeneca, our work has a direct impact on patients. We're transforming our ability to develop life-changing medicines by combining ground-breaking science with leading digital technology platforms and data. We're part of a global company that's investing in a bold digital strategy; to become a truly data-led enterprise that disrupts the entire industry. We enable AstraZeneca to perform at its peak by delivering world-class technology and data solutions.
   

  

 Are you ready to disrupt an industry and change lives? Apply now!
   

  

 We welcome your application, no later than
 **25th October.**

title: Redaktör
description:
